A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney children's movie written by people who know nothing about star wars\, have no respect for the force\, and love lucky cheesy teamwork moments\, It takes awesome aspects and characters from a wonderful saga and use them in such a shallow\, hollow\, and undisciplined manner\, you would think the writers were given thirty minutes to write the whole film. Please\, don't let me get into the details
